participant_1.background:
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
my mother is dead.
I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.
I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.

participant_2.background:
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
I've been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i have 8 brothers and we are close.
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.

content.text: I just got home from my knitting class. My fingers are killing me!
Haha, I can imagine! I like to knit sometimes, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh no, you should keep trying! It's really fun, and it's a great way to relax.
I know, I know. I just need to find the time to practice more!
Well, I'm sure you'll be a pro in no time!
Thanks! What else do you like to do for fun?
Oh, I love to read! I read a lot of fantasy and sci-fi.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! It's the best way to relax.
Yeah, it really is. What are you reading right now?
I'm reading the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series!
It's really good! I'm on the third book right now.
I'll have to check it out!
You should! It's really long, but it's worth it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
No problem! I love talking about books!
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do
